# Warner Music India

| founder     = Warner Music Group
| distributor = Warner Music Group
| genre       = Pop, Hip-hop, Rock, Bollywood, and Folk music
| country     = India
| website     =
}}
Warner Music India (WMI) is a branch of the global music company Warner Music Group (WMG) focused on the Indian music market. It was officially launched in March 2020, by Jay Mehta.
About
Making moves in the Indian Music Scene, Warner Music India is a part of the global collective of music makers & music lovers under the larger Warner Music Group. With a vision to take the Indian sound global, Warner Music India is home to a heavily curated catalogue of diverse artists across genres, categories and voices. Drivers of the entertainment culture, our music holds authenticity, originality and creativity at its core, and speaks to a multitude of audiences that spans across all generations of listeners. WMI is also home to a growing label MAATI that is nurturing & creating iconic sounds and is on its way to produce some of the most eminent folk recordings.
Artists
* Darshan Raval
* Diljit Dosanjh
* Armaan Malik
* Guru Randhawa
* King
* Reet Talwar
* Munawar Faruqui
